description: This file defines a workflow class for managing product tasks, issues, and notifications. It includes class definitions for tasks and issues, and a main workflow class that orchestrates generating tasks from meeting notes, creating issues in Linear, and sending Slack notifications. It also initializes and runs an instance of this workflow.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Model representing a task with title, description, and assignee.

classes.name: LinearIssue
classes.description: Model representing an issue in Linear with title, description, assignee, and link.

classes.name: LinearIssueList
classes.description: Container for a list of Linear issues.

classes.name: TaskList
classes.description: Container for a list of tasks.

classes.name: ProductManagerWorkflow
classes.description: Workflow class that manages generating tasks from meeting notes, creating issues in Linear, and sending Slack notifications.

methods.name: get_tasks_from_cache
methods.description: Retrieves cached tasks for the current date from session state.

methods.name: get_tasks_from_meeting_notes
methods.description: Generates tasks from meeting notes by invoking the task agent, with retries.

methods.name: create_linear_issues
methods.description: Creates issues in Linear based on tasks and user mapping.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main method to generate tasks, create issues, and send notifications, with optional caching.
